name: file-utils
readme: Node FileUtils ============== _Node.js project_ #### File and directory utilities #### [Show me!](#showme) | [Installation](#installation) | [Compatibility](#compatibility) | [Documentation](#documentation) Version: 0.3.0 Provides the typical file and directory utilities. It also has a security layer to prevent unwanted operations. #### Show me! [↑](#start) #### ```javascript var File = require ("file-utils").File; var settings = { prefix: "foo", suffix: "bar", directory: "." }; File.createTempFile (settings, function (error, file){ console.log (file.getPath ()); //Prints: foobar }); ``` #### Installation [↑](#start) #### ``` npm install file-utils ``` #### Compatibility [↑](#start) #### ✔ Node * #### Documentation [↑](#start) #### [Reference](https://github.com/Gagle/Node-FileUtils/wiki/Reference) [Examples](https://github.com/Gagle/Node-FileUtils/tree/master/examples) [Change Log](https://github.com/Gagle/Node-FileUtils/blob/master/CHANGES) [MIT License](https://github.com/Gagle/Node-FileUtils/blob/master/LICENSE)
